resources.string: Infoquest is a National Level Technical Symposium conducted by the Departments of Computer Science and Engineering & Information Technology of J.B.I.E.T

We thank the open source community for all their contributions.

 	Fast-Android-Networking

"The Event is already registered and its STATUS IS ON HOLD, Please attend the event to register a new thread of this event again."

You have registered for PaperPresentation but have not submitted your abstract yet.
 Submit your abstract to track the paper status.

 If you have already submitted the abstract, it may take upto 12hours to get your paper status updated. 

 Try again after few hours.
